articles.title: From Elvish Yadav receiving an extortion call demanding Rs 1 crore to Hina Khan and Ekta Kapoor taking at stand for Ankita Lokhande: Top TV news - IndiaTimes
articles.description: ​This week in the telly industry was full of festive vibes. TV celebs celebrated the holy festival of Navratri and Durga Puja. However, that wasn’t all, many TV celebs stirred headlines and created controversies. While, Elvish Yadav received an extortion call…
articles.content: TV fames Karan Veer Mehra and Nidhi Seth, who tied the knot in January 2021, have divorced. Their marriage hit a rough patch within a few months of their marriage and they eventually decided to part … [+513 chars]
